about_the_game:
MILITARY INVESTIGATIVE SUBTRACTION VENTURE in short M.I.S.V is an SCP INSPIRED and FEAR Organisation that works under the Radar as a Subtraction and Capture Unit for anomalous and paranormal Subjects. The Player finds himself in a Role of a MISV Agent which uses SMGs, Pistol, and Grenades to subtract different Subjects or enemie Agents.

MODES:

DISPATCH MISSIONS



SP/COOP vs SUBJECTS

Alone or with up 2 more Friends will be sent to different Locations to Hunt and subtract dangerous Subjects. Teamwork will be the key to survive the Mission.
Playable as 3 MISV/SPECTRE AGENTS vs 1 Subject controlled by AI or a Player.


EXTRACTION

COMPETITIVE PVP with PVE: 5 VS 5 MISV AGENTS VS SPECTRE AGENTS fight for the extraction of the chemical components Suitcase, with PVE threats in the MAP as Infected Subjects and special Subjects with game-changing Abilities. Players can use the environment to their advantage to create Chaos and distract or subtract competitive Players.


COMPETITIVE TDM AND FREE FOR ALL

5 VS 5 with focus on competitive multiplayer Gameplay


OUTBREAK ( STATUS 0 )

TDM 4vs4 MISV AGENTS vs SUBJECT PLAYER. Team up with other MISV Players and fight against SUBJECT Players with Special Abilities.

OPPRESSION OPERATIONS

Tactical Mode which will be revealed soon.

FEATURES


- Full Body Locomotion and IK
- Realistic Weapon handling
- Proximity voice chat and radio communication
- Offline mode
- Singleplayer and Coop Missions, MP Extraction Mode, MP Competitive Team Deathmatch, Outbreak Mode Agent Payers vs Subject Players
- Interactive environment

name: M.I.S.V VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: M.I.S.V is an SCP INSPIRED and FEAR Organisation that works as a Cleaner and Capture Unit for different threads. Play alone or with Friends against terrifying Enemies controlled by a Player or AI, or fight against other players in competitive and coop Modes.
